name: Naval Battle: Destroy Enemies
description:
Naval Battle: Destroy Enemies Sea is the best game allowing you to experience the famous naval battles of the Second World War. You can be an admiral of a navy fleet and lead numerous battleships, aircraft carriers, destroyers, submarines, and gun ships, which are made based on a thorough historical research. You can join a historic battle by making your own fleet.
Features :
- It has numerous battleships
- Missions naval battles in the history.
- Experience the realistic naval battle owing to the best graphics.
- You can make your own fleet by building up to five warships.
- It has a number of fighters and tanks.
